Jx.Grid.Renderer

This is the base class and namespace for all grid renderers.

Extends: Jx.Widget We extended Jx.Widget to take advantage of templating support.

Summary
Jx.Grid.RendererThis is the base class and namespace for all grid renderers.
Options
templateThe template for rendering this cell.
Properties
attachedtells whether this renderer is used in attached mode or not.

Options

template

The template for rendering this cell.  Will be processed as per the Jx.Widget standard.

Properties

attached

tells whether this renderer is used in attached mode or not.  Should be set by renderers that get a reference to the store.

Base class for all widgets (visual classes) in the JxLib Framework.
